name: NATIONAL GEOGRAPHIC Jumbo Dinosaur Egg Dig Kit - Dig Out 12 Dino Figures & Replica T. Rex Tooth from Giant 6" Egg, Dino Egg, Jumbo Egg, Dinosaur Egg Toys, Educational Science Kits
short_description: JUMBO-SIZED DIG BRICK - At over 6" tall, this giant dinosaur egg dig brick is our largest ever! Using the included dig tools, kids can unearth the dino figurines inside just like a professional paleontologist would do!

EXCAVATE 12 DINOS - Inside the jumbo egg are 12 dinosaur figurines, including favorites like velociraptor, stegosaurus, brachiosaurus, and more! It's the perfect start to a collection for any kid interested in dinosaurs.

REPLICA T. REX TOOTH - Also included inside the dig brick is a replica T. Rex tooth! At 3" long and molded from a real T. Rex tooth fossil, it's a high-quality, stunningly accurate specimen kids will love adding to their new dinosaur collection.

IDENTIFY & LEARN ABOUT EACH DINO - As kids uncover the dinosaur figures inside the egg, the included Learning Guide will help them identify each one. It also includes fascinating facts including their diet, where and when they lived, and more!

AWARD-WINNING PRODUCTS - Blue Marble, winner of the Toy Association's prestigious Toy of the Year Award, proudly develops products that foster education, imagination, and creativity, with a U.S. support team to ensure a stellar experience!

name: Dinosaur Stegosaurus Fossil Digging Kit for Kids, Dig and Build Educational Paleontology Set, 2-in-1 Excavation & Painting Kit with Dinosaur Model, STEM Educational Toys Gifts for Ages 6+
short_description: 🌟 UNEARTH & CREATE DUAL ADVENTURE: Transform young explorers into paleontologists with our 2-in-1 activity kit! Kids first dig up authentic dinosaur bones using chisel tools (included), then assemble a Jurassic Stegosaurus skeleton model. There is also a separate Stegosaurus model to paint. This hands-on fossil digging kit for kids sparks imagination while doubling play value – no more single-use toys!

🔬 SCIENCE-APPROVED LEARNING TOOL: Fuel curiosity through REAL scientific methods! Children master excavation techniques, identify fossil structures, and study prehistoric anatomy with our educational guidebook. This dinosaur dig kit teaches geology, patience, and critical thinking – making STEM learning 100% screen-free. Perfect for homeschool or classroom projects!

🖌️ AGE-OPTIMIZED SKILL BUILDER: Designed by child psychologists for ages 6-12. The soft gypsum excavation brick crumbles easily for small hands, while model assembly develops fine motor control. Painting the dinosaur's iconic back plates boosts creativity. Ideal dinosaur toys for kids 5-7 advancing to complex activities.

🦕 JURASSIC ACCURACY GUARANTEED: Museum-quality details that awe young minds! Features spine plates, thagomizer tail spikes, and textured skin based on fossil records. The dinosaur skeleton stands 10" tall when assembled – a realistic trophy for their bedroom. Comes with 6 non-toxic acrylic paints for vibrant customization.

⏱️ 30-MIN REWARDING CHALLENGE: No frustrating marathon projects! Kids complete both digging and assembly in one engaging session. Includes: excavation brick with dinosaur bones for kids to dig up, 4 digging tools, glue, paint set, and step-by-step visual instructions. The ultimate dinosaur fossil digging kit gift ready for birthdays or holidays!
product_description: Embark on an exciting paleontological adventure with this 2-in-1 Stegosaurus Activity Kit! Designed for young scientists ages 6 and up, this comprehensive set combines excavation thrills with hands-on building fun. Your child will experience the excitement of carefully digging up dinosaur pieces before assembling their own Stegosaurus model from the Mesozoic Jurassic period. This educational kit develops fine motor skills and scientific curiosity while offering an engaging introduction to paleontology. The complete set includes all necessary tools and materials for both digging and building phases, making it perfect for dinosaur enthusiasts and budding scientists. Through interactive exploration, children will discover fascinating details about the Stegosaurus, known for its distinctive row of plates along its back. The 30-minute assembly time provides an engaging educational experience that brings prehistoric times to life. This STEM-focused activity kit weighs 1.5 pounds and comes in a compact box measuring 10.3 x 8.2 x 2.6 inches, making it an ideal gift for any young explorer interested in dinosaurs and scientific discovery. Note: Contains small parts.
